name: Mario Clone (KurokiYurei, Pausan300)
description:
Simple 3D Mario platformer game clone created with Unity Engine as an assignment for the 3D Video Game Development subject of Tecnocampus University.

The goal is to defeat all the enemies and collect all the coins, there are 66 coins. Stars restore life points, some of them are hidden.

Controls
WASD to move around
Spacebar to jump, multiple jumps can be combined
Mouse to move camera around
Mouse Left-Click to start a hit combo

Disclaimer
We do not own any of the visual assets from the game and Mario is a registered trademark from Nintendo.

Created by Pau Sánchez Cairó and Josep Franqueza Martí
